divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a cigarette.When I finished smoking I put it out and started to go inside when I saw the ground flash from pink to blue,then it stopped.I thought it was weird but I assumed it was lightning.So after a minute or so I turn around to go back inside.And it happens again.This time I realized that I didnt not hear any thunder whatsoever.So now I'm beginning to wonder what the hell is going on.So I walk over to my car and lay my back on the hood.I wanted to see where this light was coming from.After a couple minutes I'm convinced it isn't going to happen again and just as I'm about to get up,I see this cloud above me,something above this cloud just lit up.But not only that,it flickered from pink to blue.When this happened I noticed the surrounding area of the ground light up.So now I knew that something up there was causing this phenomena.So I continue to lay there on the hood of my car and watched as it flickered a fourth time.After the fourth time,I see this long,dark shape come from out of the cloud on the left side.It was extremely long and on its side I could see a string of yellow and white lights that barely gave it a silhouette.But I could tell the bottom was not flat,it was slightly curvy,but not rounded.Almost wavy you could say.But it's size was what was most astounding.This was not a small bright light in the sky.It was nearly the size of the cloud that was covering it and I'm very certain I saw the rear-end of it because as it became visible,it was already turning its position towards north.It didn't speed off as I expected either.It just slowly drifted away and eventually disappeared into the night sky.
